code: export function shiftDate(date,numDays){var newDate=new Date(date);newDate.setDate(newDate.getDate()+numDays);return newDate;}export function getBeginningTimeForDate(date){return new Date(date.getFullYear(),date.getMonth(),date.getDate());}export function convertToDate(obj){return obj instanceof Date?obj:new Date(obj);}
